content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on the signature line on rating decisions, including
definition of signatures on rating decisions
procedure for completing a digital signature on the rating decision codesheet
single-signature rating decisions
two-signature rating decisions
obtaining additional signatures for rating decisions in VBMS-R
, and
sample rating decision codesheet signature field
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Codesheet Section
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
